Exhausting his beam rifle tot he point of automatic cooldown, Megatron Stil=
l barreled toward the fortress.=A0 Moments befoe impact, the mobile fortres=
s transformed, the Decepticon drawing and flicking on one of his powerful b=
eam sabers.=A0 The blade had not fully extensed as he swung it into the ora=
nge hot metal of the hatch he had fired on not a second earlier.=A0 
=A0
Th=
e crimson energy was an arc before him, casting its glow on his grim and de=
termined visage.=A0 the blade cut and heated the stressed metal, finally de=
forming it as it became white hot.=A0 Finally he connecting corridor was fi=
lled with a brilliant shower of sparks and molten metals, and then the whit=
e and black body of Megatron X.
=A0
For the moment he stood unapposed, but =
he was sure in seconds that would change.=A0 He stowed his fusion cannon fo=
r now and pressed on with his beam saber and rifle.=A0 All he had to do was=
 bring forth Rodimus Prime, hand him over tot he Autobots, nd he was bac to=
 his own secret fortress.=A0 Swift and simple.

--- On Thu, 11/13/08, super=

From: supercyclonus <supercyclon=
us@...>

 Thursday, November 13, 2008, 4:08 PM







Inside the Black Fortress:

On=
 a lower level, down where the recharge chambers are positioned
Cyclonus, S=
courge and the others slept, in blissful ignorance of the
events transpirin=
g around the base. 

However for a few of them, appearances were deceptive.=
 

For Cyclonus and Scourge they fought a war, not one of armor and steel
b=
ut of programming and free will. The shell programming that held
their loya=
lty to Unicron was disintegrating, but the break down was
not pretty. 

Ins=
ide them Shell program raged as slowly lost its hold it had on
them. Slowly=
 though things began to settle as Cyclonus and Scourge
began to assert thei=
r own will, for perhaps the first time in decades,
if not their lives. 

"F=
OOLISH!" The voice of Unicron echoed inside Cyclonus and Scourge's
head. "Y=
ou have escaped me for only a moment! You will never fail to
elude me compl=
etely!"

"I am NO ONE'S LACKY!" Cyclonus' voice spoke, firm as steel! 

"Ah=
hh, Cyclonus. That is where you are wrong." Unicron's voice spoke
softly, "=
You have the greatest potential of all my creations, perhaps
even more then=
 Galvatron or Vorpal, but you will always have this
final flaw, it is as th=
e core of your very being, inextricably part of
your construction: You need=
 to follow!"

"NO!" Cyclonus barked, his voice suddenly horse. 

"Yes!" Uni=
cron's voice cackled gleefully. "I will see you again. And
you will fall un=
der MY WILL ONCE MORE!"

Cyclonus just shook his head back and forth as he =
shut his eyes.
Scourge glared at Unicron before his world also went dark. 
=

************ ********* ********* ********* *

Back in the real world, in t=
he recharge pods Cyclonus and Scourge's
optics flickered and returned to li=
fe! 

With explosive power both pods burst apart as Cyclonus and Scourge
st=
ep out and looked around. "Where are we?" Cyclonus rasped as he
looked arou=
nd. 

"I smell Predacons." Scourge said as he too glanced around, his weapo=
n
drawn and ready. "They never smelled quite right! Decepticons had a
bette=
r feel to them."

Cyclonus nods, "Come, let us see who dares hold us! Yes, =
they have
much to explain!"

Cyclonus looked over at the main door to the r=
oom they were in. With a
simple gesture and just a touch of power it explod=
ed off its hinges,
flying against the far wall. 

With a slight nod Cyclonu=
s stepped out of the room and began to walk,
Scourge following behind him l=
ike a shadow!

************ ********* ********* ****

As Cyclonus stepped o=
ut of the room, and the smoke began to settle,
another chamber occupant cam=
e to life for a moment: Dark Rodimus. For
a moment his optics brightened as=
 he watched the carnage. A smile
whispered across his face and then faded a=
s he dropped back into
blissful sleep and his systems continued to repair t=
hemselves.

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Exhausting his beam rifle tot he point of automatic cooldown, Megatron Still barreled toward the fortress.  Moments befoe impact, the mobile fortress transformed, the Decepticon drawing and flicking on one of his powerful beam sabers.  The blade had not fully extensed as he swung it into the orange hot metal of the hatch he had fired on not a second earlier.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>The crimson energy was an arc before him, casting its glow on his grim and determined visage.  the blade cut and heated the stressed metal, finally deforming it as it became white hot.  Finally he connecting corridor was filled with a brilliant shower of sparks and molten metals, and then the white and black body of Megatron X.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>For the moment he stood unapposed, but he was sure in seconds that would change.  He stowed his fusion cannon for now and pressed on with his beam saber and rifle.  All he had to do was bring forth Rodimus Prime, hand him over tot he Autobots, nd he was bac to his own secret fortress.  Swift and simple.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Thu, 11/13/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>

 are we?" Cyclonus rasped as he<BR>looked around. <BR><BR>"I smell Predacons." Scourge said as he too glanced around, his weapon<BR>drawn and ready. "They never smelled quite right!
